snippet: After years on the margins, the blaring, pulsating sound of electronic dance music is ascendant, and Las Vegas has embraced the trend the only way it knows how: by going all in.
abstract: Electronic dance music is ascending in popularity, especially in Las Vegas where DJs and other dance acts are being embraced by casino nightclubs competing to sign million-dollar contracts and market these once virtually invisible artists as superstars.
lead_paragraph: After years on the margins, the blaring, pulsating sound of electronic dance music is ascendant, and Las Vegas has embraced the trend the only way it knows how: by going all in.

headline.seo: D.J.’s and Dance Music Are the New Stars in Las Vegas
headline.main: The New Stars in Vegas: D.J.’s and Dance Music
headline.print_headline: The New Stars in Vegas: D.J.’s and Dance Music
